result.name: Neon Violet - Roblox
result.description: This is the fixed version of the original, now the background works. Credits go to >Re1r1ax< for the colour choices & this redditor >Faulty Droid< as the photographer of this photo, edited by >Charlie Brown<. This code was created by me, do give feedback for improvements in the comments. If you want more fixed roblox styles just click BoopBop at the top, or you can click DittoDino below for some mediocre youtube progressbars.
result.notes: This is the Alt of DittoDino. Disclaimers: Tablets/iPads or phones won't work, Chrome & Opera are the only browsers that work well with the extension. Press 'Read more' for further help. Help Sections Links Below. English Help Section. Turkish Translated Help Section - Yardım bölümü Türkçe'ye çevrildi. French Translated Help Section - Section d'aide traduite en français - cliquez ici. Russian/Cyrillic Translated Help Section - Русский/кириллица переведенный раздел помощи - кликните сюда. Spanish Translated Help Section - Sección de ayuda traducida al español - haga clic aquí. The original theme was this Neon Violet. It's a link. 18 August 2022 - Released 17 April 2023 - Revamped style with new base code. 21 August 2023 - A very late 1st anniversary, thanks for the 18k installs.
